name: Tronox Holdings plc
description: Tronox Holdings plc is a global leader in the mining, production, and marketing of titanium dioxide (TiO2) pigment and is one of the largest producers of titanium dioxide globally. Founded in 2005 and headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut, Tronox operates several mining and manufacturing facilities worldwide, providing high-quality TiO2 products essential for various applications, including paints, coatings, plastics, and paper. The company is committed to sustainability and responsible environmental practices, emphasizing the reduction of its carbon footprint and efficient resource management. Tronox’s extensive operations encompass both upstream titanium mining and downstream pigment production, enabling the company to maintain a competitive edge in the marketplace. In addition to TiO2, Tronox also produces other titanium-based products and has a growing portfolio of specialty chemicals. With a focus on innovation and customer service, Tronox aims to meet the evolving needs of its clients while contributing to sustainable development. The company’s mission is to enhance the quality of life for its customers, employees, and communities while fostering a culture of safety and environmental stewardship.
